sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Fileutils-&fileutils-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: ar, as, ld diffutils: cmp fileutils: chmod, cp, install, ln, ls, mkdir, mv, rm gcc: cc grep: egrep, grep make: make sed: sed sh-utils: basename, expr, sleep, uname textutils: cat, tr, uniq
